text: Pepita, or pumpkin seed, is the edible seed of pumpkins or related squashes. Pepita may also refer to: *Pepita glass engraving *The Pepita, later the Maria Asumpta, a brig that sailed from 1858 to 1995 ;In people * Pepita de Oliva (1830–1871), Spanish dancer * Pepita Pardell (1928-2019), Spanish animator, cartoonist, illustrator, painter ==See also== *Pepito (disambiguation)
title: Pepita (disambiguation)
